42219.name: Number of polio cases (WHO (2017))
42219.description: Number of poliomyelitis virus cases (includes both the wild and VAPP types of polio, as well as both indigenous and imported from other countries types of polio)
42219.datasetName: Total cases of poliomyelitis virus by country and year from 1980 onwards - WHO (2017)
42219.s_name: Report of Selected Vaccine Preventable Diseases (VPDs) - WHO (2017)

source.name: Report of Selected Vaccine Preventable Diseases (VPDs) - WHO (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: UNICEF and WHO's Joint Reporting Form (JRP) on Immunization, Vaccines and Biologicals (further explanations here: http://www.who.int/immunization/monitoring_surveillance/routine/reporting/en/)
source.additionalInfo: The WHO link above has the dataset saved under point "3.1 Reported incidence time series". The WHO last updated this dataset on 31 July 2017 which comprises the data shown here.
